categories: Category:Legends short stories from Star Wars Insider

nodes.text: "The Guns of Kelrodo-Ai" is a short story written by Jason Fry that appeared in the magazine Star Wars Insider 132 in 2012, as a tie-in to The Essential Guide to Warfare.
The story covers the events of the Battle of Kelrodo-Ai during the Western Reaches Operation of the Reconquest of the Rim.
